concept.title: Set Drawing Orientation
concept.shortdesc: The drawing orientation determines whether to plot a drawing portrait or landscape.

conbody.p: If you select Landscape, plots the drawing using the longedge as horizontal. While selecting Portrait to plot the drawing using its minor edge as horizontal Changing the drawing orientation just like rotating the paper under the drawing. Meanwhile, selecting Plot upside-down to control whether to locate the drawing upside-down on paper.
